description: Updates a budget that sets spending thresholds for rendering activity.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique token which the server uses to recognize retries of the same request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the budget to update.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of the budget to update.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the budget to update.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Updates the status of the budget. ACTIVE---The budget is being evaluated. INACTIVE---The budget is inactive. This can include Expired, Canceled, or deleted Deleted statuses.

parameters.name: actionsToAdd
parameters.description: The budget actions to add. Budget actions specify what happens when the budget runs out. (dict) --- The budget action to add. The type of budget action to add. The percentage threshold for the budget action to add. description (string) --- A description for the budget action to add.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of budget action to add.

nested_params.name: thresholdPercentage
nested_params.description: The percentage threshold for the budget action to add.

nested_params.name: description
nested_params.description: A description for the budget action to add.

parameters.name: actionsToRemove
parameters.description: The budget actions to remove from the budget. (dict) --- The budget action to remove. The type of budget action to remove. The percentage threshold for the budget action to remove.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of budget action to remove.

nested_params.name: thresholdPercentage
nested_params.description: The percentage threshold for the budget action to remove.

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: The schedule to update. fixed (dict) --- The fixed start and end time of the budget's schedule. When the budget starts. When the budget ends.

nested_params.name: fixed
nested_params.description: The fixed start and end time of the budget's schedule.
